glsa.title: ClamAV: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in ClamAV, allowing for a Denial of Service.

background.p: ClamAV is a GPL virus scanner.

description.p: Metaeye Security Group reported a NULL pointer dereference in ClamAV when processing RAR archives.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted RAR archive to the clamd daemon, resulting in a crash and a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ClamAV users should upgrade to the latest version:
